column4: Hi. My laptop has an intel 815 chipset. The screen ( native resolution 1024x768) is running only at 640*400 on the live cd amaking it impossible fore me to install. is htere any way i can install from a command line?
alternate CD would be the one if you prefer to install from CLI
if your cd writer is not reliable, then burn it at the lowest speed to ensure it will write correctly.
AND md5sum the CD once it is finished to be sure it's good.
